article.title: Searching CA Condensates On-Line vs. the CA Keyword Indexes
article.author: Michaels, C. J.
article.text: A study was conducted to compare the comprehensiveness of searches performed using Systems Development Corporation's (SDC) Chemcon data base and keyword indexes of Chemical Abstracts.. It was concluded that, in most cases, a computer search yielded at least as many relevant references as did a manual search.. However, in the case of very general search questions, results from manual searches were much more satisfactory..
